byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: As Hillary Rodham Clinton begins her campaign for the presidency this week, she's starting low-key, but soon she will prefer a focus on issues.

headline.main: Sneak Peek at Hillary Clinton on Campaign
headline.print_headline: Sneak Peek at Clinton on Campaign

snippet: As Hillary Rodham Clinton begins her campaign for the presidency this week, she's starting low-key, but soon she will prefer a focus on issues.
